INSERT INTO t_user_authority (login, name) VALUES ('staff', 'ROLE_STAFF'), ('staff', 'ROLE_STAFF_IHTSDO'), ('sweden', 'ROLE_STAFF'), ('sweden', 'ROLE_STAFF_SE')

changeSet.author: DGJ
changeSet.comment: Associate Country with Member
changeSet.sql: update country set member_id = (select member_id from member where key = 'IHTSDO') where iso_code_2 <> 'SE' AND exclude_registration = FALSE
update country set member_id = (select member_id from member where key = 'SE') where iso_code_2 = 'SE' AND exclude_registration = FALSE

changeSet.author: DGJ
changeSet.comment: Associate Member with Affiliate and Application
changeSet.sql: update application set member_id = (select member_id from member where key = 'IHTSDO')
update affiliate set home_member_id = (select member_id from member where key = 'IHTSDO')

changeSet.author: MB/DGJ
changeSet.sql: delete from application as ap where not exists (select 1 from affiliate af where af.creator = ap.username)
update application set affiliate_id = (select af.affiliate_id from affiliate af where af.creator = username)

changeSet.author: AC

changeSet.author: AC/MB
changeSet.comment: Use blob storage for files

changeSet.author: ac/mb
changeSet.comment: Load up IHTSDO license
changeSet.sql: update tmpblob set o = lo_create(-1);
select lowrite(lo_open((select o from tmpblob),131072), (select content from tmpblob));

insert into file (file_id, filename, updated_at, creator, mimetype, content) values (nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'Ihtsdo_AffiliateLicenceAgreement_v11.pdf', now(), 'system', 'application/pdf', (select o from tmpblob))
update member set license_file = (select file_id from file where file.filename = 'Ihtsdo_AffiliateLicenceAgreement_v11.pdf' limit 1)

changeSet.author: AC
changeSet.comment: Fixing licence spelling

changeSet.author: DGJ
changeSet.comment: Add creation timestamp for applications

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Move subType from PrimaryApplication to AffiliateDetails
changeSet.sql: UPDATE affiliate_details SET subtype = pa.subtype FROM affiliate_details AS af_ad JOIN affiliate AS af ON af.affiliate_details_id = af_ad.affiliate_details_id JOIN application AS pa ON pa.application_id = af.application_id

UPDATE affiliate_details SET subtype = pa.subtype FROM affiliate_details AS application_ad JOIN application ON application.affiliate_details_id = application_ad.affiliate_details_id JOIN affiliate ON application.affiliate_id = affiliate.affiliate_id JOIN application AS pa ON affiliate.application_id = pa.application_id

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Move type and other_text from PrimaryApplication to AffiliateDetails
changeSet.sql: UPDATE affiliate_details SET type = pa.type FROM affiliate_details AS af_ad JOIN affiliate AS af ON af.affiliate_details_id = af_ad.affiliate_details_id JOIN application AS pa ON pa.application_id = af.application_id

UPDATE affiliate_details SET type = pa.type, other_text = pa.other_text FROM affiliate_details AS application_ad JOIN application ON application.affiliate_details_id = application_ad.affiliate_details_id JOIN affiliate ON application.affiliate_id = affiliate.affiliate_id JOIN application AS pa ON affiliate.application_id = pa.application_id

changeSet.author: DGJ
changeSet.comment: Add staff notes to affiliate

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Move agreementType from usage to affiliate_details. Changed to default agreement_type if no other source found.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE affiliate_details SET agreement_type = u.agreement_type FROM affiliate_details as ad JOIN affiliate as a ON a.affiliate_details_id = ad.affiliate_details_id JOIN commercial_usage as u ON u.affiliate_id = a.affiliate_id

UPDATE affiliate_details SET agreement_type = u.agreement_type FROM affiliate_details as ad JOIN application as app ON app.affiliate_details_id = ad.affiliate_details_id JOIN commercial_usage as u ON u.affiliate_id = app.affiliate_id
UPDATE affiliate_details SET agreement_type = 'AFFILIATE_NORMAL' WHERE agreement_type is null

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Drop not-null constraint to support import

changeSet.author: DGJ
changeSet.comment: Add commercial usage entity references to audit log

changeSet.author: DGJ
changeSet.comment: Add affiliate standing state
changeSet.sql: UPDATE affiliate SET standing_state='APPLYING'
UPDATE affiliate a SET standing_state='REJECTED' FROM application app WHERE a.affiliate_id = app.affiliate_id AND app.application_type='PRIMARY' AND app.approval_state='REJECTED'
UPDATE affiliate a SET standing_state='IN_GOOD_STANDING' FROM application app WHERE a.affiliate_id = app.affiliate_id AND app.application_type='PRIMARY' AND app.approval_state='APPROVED'

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Introduce sequence pk to T_USER so login can be easily edited
changeSet.sql: update t_user set user_id = nextval('hibernate_sequence')
update t_user_authority set user_id = u.user_id from t_user as u where u.login = t_user_authority.login
update T_PERSISTENT_TOKEN set user_id = u.user_id from t_user as u where u.login = T_PERSISTENT_TOKEN.user_login

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Extend user_id sequence change to password_reset table
changeSet.sql: update password_reset_token set user_id = u.user_id from t_user as u where u.login = user_login

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Allow longer keys in audit data to hold "original." items

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Better blob support for pdf handling

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Re-load IHTSDO license -- it was corrupt.
changeSet.sql: update tmpblob set o = blob_write(content);
update file set content = (select o from tmpblob) where filename = 'Ihtsdo_AffiliateLicenceAgreement_v11.pdf'

changeSet.author: MB
changeSet.comment: Clean out our test users
changeSet.sql: delete from t_persistent_token where user_id in (select user_id from t_user where login in ('system','anonymousUser','admin','user','staff','sweden'))
delete from password_reset_token where user_id in (select user_id from t_user where login in ('system','anonymousUser','admin','user','staff','sweden'))
delete from t_user_authority where user_id in (select user_id from t_user where login in ('system','anonymousUser','admin','user','staff','sweden'))
delete from t_user where user_id in (select user_id from t_user where login in ('system','anonymousUser','admin','user','staff','sweden'))

changeSet.comment: Add additional IHTSDO and SE Member authority roles

changeSet.comment: Add opt-out options for receiving release and manual notifications

changeSet.comment: Follow up to MLDS-962, allow user to opt for affiliate country release related emails only

changeSet.author: MLR
changeSet.comment: A view to help out with (text) indexing extra countries related to an affiliate
changeSet.createView: select a.affiliate_id, string_agg(common_name, ' ') as countries from application a , member m , country c where approval_state = 'APPROVED' and m.member_id = a.member_id and c.iso_code_2 = m.key group by 1;
